text: "You Wear It Well" is a 1985 song by DeBarge and is the third single from their fourth studio album Rhythm of the Night. It peaked at number 46 in the United States. It was featured in an episode of The Facts of Life on 2 November, 1985 when El DeBarge guest starred in it. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:DeBarge songs
title: You Wear It Well (DeBarge song)
